channel.title: Dodian?
channel.description: Devolution v7 is part dodian right? What really is a dodian server? And what is the difference between a dodian server and a regular server? Programing/coding different at all?

item.title: Dodian?
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

The coding is just different, that’s it.
I’m used to it already, like I started coding probably 5 months ago >.<
You’ll like it but you’ll hate it in your first few tries or attempts to code.

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Soul Breaker:

It’s different, Dodian is actually stable than the other servers. They have a lot of junk in their boolean process, which Dodian doesn’t really have. It’s organized well and good, so I’d say dodian is a better server, but harder to code

How is it harder to code? Like different? How?

Read full topic

It’s different, Dodian is actually stable than the other servers. They have a lot of junk in their boolean process, which Dodian doesn’t really have. It’s organized well and good, so I’d say dodian is a better server, but harder to code

it takes like 1-2 days to make a server stable (unless it already is)
